full_summary:
### National Master Standing Offers for Marine Fuels

**Tender Reference:** WS3915620080-Doc3993116459
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** May 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 15, 2023 at 14:00:00 (EST)

**About this Tender:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB) standards. The successful bidder will be contracted for delivery of marine fuels across various locations in Canada, including Comprehensive Land Claims Settlement Areas.

**Notice Type:**
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO), which is classified as competitive with open bidding.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply marine fuels in accordance with CGSB standards
* Deliver marine fuels to various locations across Canada
* Deliver marine fuels to destinations across Canada, including Comprehensive Land Claims Settlement Areas
* Delivery of marine fuels is required between June 1, 2023 and May 31, 2025

**Applicable Agreements:**

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR), Newfoundland and Labrador, British Columbia, Ontario (except NCR), Northwest Territories, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, and Prince Edward Island

**Contact Information:**
If you have any queries, please contact Bobbi MacLeod at  bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
